Dialogue: Welp, looks like it's time to get up. I can smell something good downstairs...
Can't you bring the food up here instead of banging on my door?
The big cat walks over to the curtains and opens them up, letting in rays of sunshine so pleasant to most. Annoying to me.
There we go, let's let some sunshine in here!
The food is already sitting on the kitchen table ready for you to arrive!
Come down quickly before it gets coooold!
Breakfast does sound pretty great right now.
The kitchen ain't bad. Got your microwave, oven, stovetop, kitchen table, drawers and cupboards filled with utensils and equipment.
We could cook whatever we wanted.
I made some cheesy omelettes with pieces of pepperoni in them.
Dang, this snow leopard really knows how to cook!
Wait, there are 3 of you now?
